name: Dragon Twister Demolishing Wind

trigger.text: Return up to 1 cost 6 or less character to its owner's hand.

text: #Counter Give up to 1 of your leaders or characters +4000 Power this battle. Then, place up to 1 cost 1 or lower character on the bottom of its owner's deck.

effect.text: Give up to 1 of your leaders or characters +4000 Power this battle. Then, place up to 1 cost 1 or lower character on the bottom of its owner's deck.
Return up to 1 cost 6 or less character to its owner's hand.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'C' in a box in the bottom right corner.
